commands.name: az storage container lease acquire
commands.syntax:
az storage container lease acquire --container-name
                                   [--account-key]
                                   [--account-name]
                                   [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                   [--blob-endpoint]
                                   [--connection-string]
                                   [--if-match]
                                   [--if-modified-since]
                                   [--if-none-match]
                                   [--if-unmodified-since]
                                   [--lease-duration]
                                   [--proposed-lease-id]
                                   [--sas-token]
                                   [--tags-condition]
                                   [--timeout]
examples: az storage container lease acquire --container-name mycontainer --account-name mystorageaccount --account-key 0000-0000

commands.name: az storage container lease break
commands.summary: Break the lease, if the container has an active lease.
commands.syntax:
az storage container lease break --container-name
                                 [--account-key]
                                 [--account-name]
                                 [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                 [--blob-endpoint]
                                 [--connection-string]
                                 [--if-match]
                                 [--if-modified-since]
                                 [--if-none-match]
                                 [--if-unmodified-since]
                                 [--lease-break-period]
                                 [--sas-token]
                                 [--tags-condition]
                                 [--timeout]
examples: az storage container lease break -c mycontainer --lease-break-period 10 --account-name mystorageaccount --account-key 0000-0000

commands.name: az storage container lease change
commands.summary: Change the lease ID of an active lease.
commands.syntax:
az storage container lease change --container-name
                                  --lease-id
                                  --proposed-lease-id
                                  [--account-key]
                                  [--account-name]
                                  [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                  [--blob-endpoint]
                                  [--connection-string]
                                  [--if-match]
                                  [--if-modified-since]
                                  [--if-none-match]
                                  [--if-unmodified-since]
                                  [--sas-token]
                                  [--tags-condition]
                                  [--timeout]
examples: az storage container lease change -c mycontainer --lease-id "32fe23cd-4779-4919-adb3-357e76c9b1bb" --proposed-lease-id "sef2ef2d-4779-4919-adb3-357e76c9b1bb" --account-name mystorageaccount --account-key 0000-0000

commands.name: az storage container lease release
commands.syntax:
az storage container lease release --container-name
                                   --lease-id
                                   [--account-key]
                                   [--account-name]
                                   [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                   [--blob-endpoint]
                                   [--connection-string]
                                   [--if-match]
                                   [--if-modified-since]
                                   [--if-none-match]
                                   [--if-unmodified-since]
                                   [--sas-token]
                                   [--tags-condition]
                                   [--timeout]
examples: az storage container lease release -c mycontainer --lease-id "32fe23cd-4779-4919-adb3-357e76c9b1bb" --account-name mystorageaccount --account-key 0000-0000

commands.name: az storage container lease renew
commands.syntax:
az storage container lease renew --container-name
                                 --lease-id
                                 [--account-key]
                                 [--account-name]
                                 [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                 [--blob-endpoint]
                                 [--connection-string]
                                 [--if-match]
                                 [--if-modified-since]
                                 [--if-none-match]
                                 [--if-unmodified-since]
                                 [--sas-token]
                                 [--tags-condition]
                                 [--timeout]
examples: az storage container lease renew -c mycontainer --lease-id "32fe23cd-4779-4919-adb3-357e76c9b1bb" --account-name mystorageaccount --account-key 0000-0000
